newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse closes slightly lower, volume up.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse closes slightly lower, volume up.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index closed slightly lower on Friday in higher trading volume boosted by the bond market, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 507.19, down 0.43 percent from 509.36 on Thursday.
Total volume was 12.975 million dinars against 877,008 dinars. Turnover on the bond market was 1.758 million dinars, and 1.375 million dinars in the over-the-counter exchanges.
"Trade on the primary market continued to be calm. Investors are in a wait-and-see stance. But nobody knows what they expect," a broker said. Turnover on the first market was 527,747 dinars.
The only significant move on the primary market was Banque de Tunisie which fell 2.46 dinars to 80.14 dinars with only 684 shares changing hands. STB bank eased 0.6 dinar to 19.4 dinars.
Airline Tunis Air was up 0.3 dinar to 23 dinars with 4,857 shares changing hands.
